description: Flexible, non-conductive, and strong. /b/Rubber/b/ will be a major part of every electric machine. You can produce it by /6/mixing/6/ /b/Paper/b/ with either /b/Synthetic Oil/b/ or /b/Synthetic Rubber/b/. Mix the /b/Coke Dust/b/ you made with /b/Water/b/ in a /b/Mixer/b/ to produce /b/Raw Synthetic Oil/b/. Use a /b/Steam Blast Furnace/b/ to produce these two fluids. /b/Synthetic Rubber/b/ is more difficult to obtain, /6/but will yield more rubber per sheet of paper/6/.

Remember that you'll need a --lot-- of /b/Rubber Sheets/b/ in the long run, so you'll need to make them constantly. Note that you can use /b/Wood/b/ to /6/grind down/6/ and turn into /b/Wood Pulp/b/ which can then be turned into /b/Paper/b/ with a high output yield.
